definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: To live in a thrifty way, you need to pay attention to your day-to-day expenses.
sentences.chinese: 若要节俭生活，你需要格外关注日常开支。

sentences.english: Only very thrifty chirdren manage to fill up a money-box.
sentences.chinese: 只有非常节俭的儿童才会设法填满一个储蓄罐。

sentences.english: This frugality is starting to show up in overall wedding costs.
sentences.chinese: 新人们在整场婚礼的开销上也开始节俭起来了。

sentences.english: You don't haveto be a footloose young traveler to adopt this frugal mindset.
sentences.chinese: 你不必一定要做这种节俭行事的自由旅行者。

sentences.english: I think mass frugality would be good for the economy.
sentences.chinese: 我认为大伙都过节俭的生活才对经济有利。

sentences.english: What if I'm semi-retired? I'm living frugally already.
sentences.chinese: 我如果半退休了怎么办呢？我过得已经很节俭了。

sentences.english: Living a thrifty lifestyle does not have to mean doing without.
sentences.chinese: 节俭的生活方式并不一定意味着什么都不做。

sentences.english: If you’re going to eat dried fruit, do it sparingly.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想吃干果的话，节俭点吧。

sentences.english: Cowards call themselves cautious and misers thrifty.
sentences.chinese: 胆小鬼说自己谨慎，守财奴称自己节俭。

sentences.english: My go-to activity for a cheap date?
sentences.chinese: 我的主要活动要围绕节俭约会吗？

sentences.english: A good manager is frugal in the use of his funds .
sentences.chinese: 一个善于理财的人在资金运用上是很节俭的。

sentences.english: Family's hotel, warm and comfortable, spacious and bright, Hygiene thrifty.
sentences.chinese: 家庭宾馆，温馨舒适，宽敞明亮，卫生节俭。

sentences.english: There’s a difference between minimalism and frugality.
sentences.chinese: 极简和节俭还是有差别的。

sentences.english: She was the thrifty one among her buddies of working girls.
sentences.chinese: 殷彩霞是那帮姐妹里最节俭的女孩。

sentences.english: Are you conserving on Front Desk expendables?
sentences.chinese: 你在前台消耗品方面是否做到节俭？

sentences.english: So, I feel comfortable advocating frugality.
sentences.chinese: 所以，提倡节俭使我感觉到安逸。

definition: hardworking and thrifty in running one's household
extravagant (idiom); to throw away money by the handful/wasteful
to save on food and clothing (idiom); to live frugally
to live frugally/to economize on food and clothing/to scrimp and save
